project_name.justification: Great Eagle Gold Corp. (CSE: GEGC) (FSE: GI8) ("Great Eagle") is pleased to announce the signing of a binding letter of intent ("LOI") with Teras Resources Inc. ("Teras") to acquire 100% of the subsurface mineral rights pertaining to a U.S. Patented Land Claim package, located in Imperial County, California, collectively known as the Cahuilla gold project.

company_name.justification: Great Eagle Gold Corp. (CSE: GEGC) (FSE: GI8) ("Great Eagle") is pleased to announce the signing of a binding letter of intent ("LOI") with Teras Resources Inc. ("Teras") to acquire 100% of the subsurface mineral rights...collectively known as the Cahuilla gold project.

ceo_buyer.justification: Great Eagle CEO and Director, Andrew Fletcher, declared emphatically...

interest_acquired_percent.justification: ...to acquire 100% of the subsurface mineral rights pertaining to a U.S. Patented Land Claim package, located in Imperial County, California, collectively known as the Cahuilla gold project.

primary_commodity.justification: Great Eagle Gold Commits US $18,376,904 for Multi-Million Ounce NI 43-101 Certified Gold-Silver Deposit in California

verified_article_link.justification: The article is about the acquisition of the Cahuilla project by Great Eagle Gold Corp. The source link is provided at the end of the text: 'To view the source version of this press release, please visit https://www.newsfilecorp.com/release/209422'

currency.justification: The text consistently uses 'US $' to denote the currency, for example: 'The total agreed purchase price for the entire Cahuilla gold project is US $18,376,904.'

cash_payments_raw.justification: The transaction is described with a total combined value, not separate cash and share payments. Therefore, per the financial data extraction hierarchy, this field is null.

share_payments_raw.justification: The transaction is described with a total combined value, not separate cash and share payments. Therefore, per the financial data extraction hierarchy, this field is null.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The total purchase price is the sum of Phase 1 (US $8,616,660) and Phase 2 (US $9,760,243). The text states: 'The total agreed purchase price for the entire Cahuilla gold project is US $18,376,904.'

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The text does not specify an amount of shares to be issued as part of the consideration for the project acquisition.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: The text does not mention any share warrant payments as part of the transaction.

option_payments_raw.justification: The text does not mention any option payments as part of the transaction.

issued_share_price.justification: The text does not specify an amount of shares to be issued or a price per share for the transaction.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The text does not mention any exploration commitment in terms of drilling meters.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The text does not state an exploration spending commitment for the buyer, Great Eagle Gold. It mentions that the seller, Teras, has the right to explore at its own expense: 'Teras has the exclusive right to undertake exploration activities at its own expense...'

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: The text does not mention a Net Smelter Royalty (NSR) or Gross Revenue Royalty (GRR) as part of the transaction terms.

coverage_area_raw.justification: The 1,680-acre Cahuilla gold project contains a multi-million ounce, tokenization-ready deposit of certified gold and silver resources...

coverage_area_unit.justification: The 1,680-acre Cahuilla gold project contains a multi-million ounce, tokenization-ready deposit of certified gold and silver resources...

resource_size.value: 1,261,364 ounces of indicated gold resources, 14,336,659 ounces of indicated silver resources, 74,870 ounces of inferred gold resources, and 685,520 ounces of inferred silver resources
resource_size.justification: This NI 43-101 report certifies: 1,261,364 ounces of indicated gold resources. 14,336,659 ounces of indicated silver resources. 74,870 ounces of inferred gold resources. 685,520 ounces of inferred silver resources.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The buyer's ticker and exchange are explicitly mentioned in the first paragraph: 'Great Eagle Gold Corp. (CSE: GEGC) (FSE: GI8) ("Great Eagle")'
